name: Hotline Score Counter
description:
If unchecked, the H024 Score Counter is disabled
(This action may improve performance).

name: Nikku Style Menu
description:
if unchecked, the Nikku Style Menu is disabled
(If you have performance problems, you can activate the 'Low Quality' option).

name: Set Nikku's Style:
description:
Select a different Nikku's style
(if the 'Nikku Select Menu' is unchecked)

name: Hotline Pause Menu
description:
if unchecked, the H024 Pause Menu is disabled
(If you have performance problems, you can activate the 'Low Quality' option).

name: Set Pause Music:
description: Select the different tracks from H024 or those available in the Psych Client Preferences.

name: Hotline Game Over
description:
if unchecked, the H024 Game Over is disabled.
(if checked, you have a 1 in 100 chance of seeing something... 'special')
